name: Fisherman Sabotage
description:
Submission for the TriJam #188 with the prompt Sabotage.

It was around 5 am when I saw this game jam and I finished my game around 8:40 am lol with a short break in the middle because I was falling asleep. Technically this is my first completed game jam and it was nuts. Really it's not even a finished game because I ran out of time trying to put all the instructions in.. I also wanted to code a string to connect to the hook but obviously, that didn't happen. So yea this game is an amalgamation of 15 minutes of planning and then 3 straight hours of coding systems just to end up with a buggy mess. This was my first official game jam and I can safely say 3 hours is a short time bro haha....

Controls 

WASD to move

Space to Collect Trash

Credits

Fish Sprites and Fishing Platform - https://opengameart.org/content/fishing-game-assets-pixel-art

Background music - https://opengameart.org/content/mere-baublessailing-the-mysterious-seas

2 sound effects - SFXR 

Font - Gomarice no continue

GUI Buttons - From open game art but it's been a while so I couldn't find it again just used my old files

Can, Hook and Boot Sprites and Code - Yours truly :P
